description:
Mariabelle is the District Mayor`s assistant, which makes her http://anidb.net/ch3397 [Yuuhi]`s assistant. She is an immortal human.
200 years ago, Mariabelle once died from a deadly disease but her father resurrected her and use her body as a basis to make a cure for the disease to save her brother and her village. Now an immortal and a living dead, she and her father travelled to Sakurashin to have her tuned to prevent other half youkais who seeks her immortality but Yuuhi manage to persuade them not to. As a sign of gratitude for saving her life, Mariabelle became Yuuhi`s assistant.
She is always seen in various cosplay outfit due to Yuuhi.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Mariabelle
